cursorDeactivated().Description: Called by a SQLiteCursor when it is released.

cursorRequeried(android.database.Cursor).Description: Called by a SQLiteCursor when it is requeried.

Returns: a Cursor over the result set
Parameters: SQLiteDatabase.CursorFactory: The CursorFactory to use when creating the Cursors, or null if standard SQLiteCursors should be returned.
query(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteData.Description: Executes the query returning a Cursor over the result set.
query(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteData.FullName: public abstract Cursor query (SQLiteDatabase.CursorFactory factory, String[] bindArgs)

cursorClosed().Description: Called by a SQLiteCursor when it it closed to destroy this object as well.

setBindArguments(java.lang.String[]).Description: Set new bind arguments. These will take effect in cursorRequeried().

ClassDesc: A driver for SQLiteCursors that is used to create them and gets notified by the cursors it creates on significant events in their lifetimes.
